hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: What do you study? buying viagra uk over counter Education alone could solve most of these problems, including the decline of the middle class. Are we massively increasing the availability of higher education in order to train Americans for the jobs of the future (science, engineering, math, cmputers,telecommunications, research and development, medicine, space exploration, etc)? No. We would rather dwell on the lost jobs of the past than do the necessary work to ensure that Americans are capable of doing the jobs of the future.
